vocabulary.definition: having an abundance of vegetation; characterized by richness or profusion
vocabulary.example: The rainforest was lush with greenery and vibrant flowers.

vocabulary.definition: huge systems of stars, gas, dust, and dark matter bound together by gravity
vocabulary.example: Scientists study the movement and evolution of galaxies in the universe.

vocabulary.definition: not able to be recognized or identified; completely changed
vocabulary.example: After the renovation, the old building was unrecognizable.
The car made an accelerating noise as it sped down the highway.

vocabulary.definition: objects or substances that emit something, especially light or sound
vocabulary.example: In the dark, the fireflies acted as tiny emitters of light.

vocabulary.definition: changing from a liquid or solid state into vapor or gas
vocabulary.example: The puddles were evaporating quickly under the hot sun.
